# pay-iota



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                                          | Type                                                                    | Default                |
| --------------- | ---------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `address`       | `address`        | The IOTA address to send funds to.                                   | `string`                                                                | `undefined`            |
| `buttonLabel`   | `button-label`   | Define button label text. Defaults to "Pay with IOTA"                | `string`                                                                | `undefined`            |
| `paymentAmount` | `payment-amount` | Define button label text. Defaults to "Pay with IOTA"                | `number`                                                                | `undefined`            |
| `type`          | `type`           | Button types supported by PIOTA. Each of them visualise differently. | `BUTTON_TYPES.BALANCE \| BUTTON_TYPES.DONATION \| BUTTON_TYPES.PAYMENT` | `BUTTON_TYPES.PAYMENT` |
